entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
